sorular.soru: What is the maximum allowed speed for a vehicle with this number plate?

feedback.metin: This number plate belongs to a snorfiets. This vehicle falls under mopeds but has a maximum construction speed of 25 km/h. A snorfietser is not allowed to exceed 25 km/h.

sorular.soru: What is the maximum visibility allowed if you want to use rear fog lights during fog or snowfall?

feedback.metin: In case of very dense fog or snowfall that restricts visibility to a maximum distance of 50 metres, it is allowed to use your rear fog light. In case of poor visibility due to rainfall this is never allowed!

sorular.soru: How fast are you allowed to drive here?

feedback.metin: In built-up areas, cars are not allowed to drive faster than 50 km/h.
